name: 10 Seconds to Hell - LD51
description:
HIGHLY RECOMMENDED YOU PRESS THE FULLSCREEN BUTTON IN THE BOTTOM RIGHT TO PLAY

A bullet-hell style game inspired by the LD51 theme ‘Every 10 Seconds’.

The aim is simple - survive as long as you can. Every 10 seconds every single enemy will fire their gun at you, and the projectiles will seek you until you destroy them.

WASD to move, Boost (space bar) to gain a burst of speed and become temporarily invincible. You can destroy projectiles and enemies in this state. It’ll take a little while to recharge though, so look out for the flash to know when you’re good to go.

More enemies will spawn over time, and they’ll spawn faster the longer you last so watch out!

Live as long as you can - good luck!

---------------------

This was made after nearly a year away from game development to help me get back into it and shake off the rust.

Tools: Unity  (using Playmaker)
